alert.note: Alert for Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:51PM EDT until July 28 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Windsor County in southern Vermont... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 551 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Baltimore, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Chester, Windsor, Ludlow, Cavendish, Andover, Ludlow Village, Perkinsville Village, Ascutney, Baltimore, Springfield, Weathersfield, West Windsor, Reading, Perkinsville, Felchville, Brownsville, North Chester, Ascutney State Park, North Springfield Lake Recreation Area and Proctorsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
